A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Who would have thought that Disney would ever make a Star Wars movie\, which was worse than the Phantom Menace?

After a very promising 'welcome back to a galaxy far\, far away' sequel in Episode 7: The Force Awakens\, the follow up Episode taking place immediately afterwards fails to deliver on nearly everything the previous installment set up. 

A wishy-washy affair\, which does not know what direction to go in...tries going in both and ultimately fails as a story.

Avoid.
